Usage
=====

Creating a New Party
--------------------
To create a new event, log in to the admin dashboard and navigate to Parties > Add program. Fill in the required details, such as purpose, date, time, and location. Click "Save" to create the party.

Managing Invitations
--------------------
From the party details page, click on the "Manage Programs" button to invite guests. You can send notifications via email and track attendance of members.

Tracking Expenses
-----------------
On the party details page, click on the "Expenses" tab to add and manage organisational expenses. You can set a budget and track expenses to stay within your budget.

Enjoy the planning experience with MyParty!
